person.persName: Edwin R. Cook (Christian County, Kentucky, physician and asylum manager)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, physician and asylum manager. Bedford County, Virginia native. Son of William Cook. Married in Martha Upshur Campbell Cook. Father of Sally P. Cook, Walter C. Cook, and Florence Cook. Graduated from the Pennsylvania Medical University in 1847. Physician in Hopkinsville in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in 1860. Board member and manager of the Western Lunatic Asylum in 1865.
